pacman

Class GridReadCreate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pacman.GridReadCreate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GridReadCreate
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A GridReadCreate object reads an input file containing lines of numbers corresponding to grid pieces. It also then translates this file into an array containing the correct numbers for each location, and draws those images. GridReadCreate also keeps track of the player's current score and can determine if the player has won at any time.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
